              org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.test.AbstractGrailsMockTests

public abstract class AbstractGrailsMockTests
extends groovy.util.GroovyTestCase

Abstract simple test harness for testing Grails Applications that just loads the parsed classes into the GrailsApplication instance.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
